intro.title: Introduction
intro.description: Aki is a tech leader, entrepreneur, and web developer passionate about solving real-world problems through technology. As the founder of Gravity Elements, he leads the creation of user-centric web experiences that balance functionality and simplicity. His core focus is helping long-established mom-and-pop shops adapt to new changes by modernizing their websites with scalable, modern tools that help their businesses thrive in an ever-evolving digital world.
